title: 举报游仙神奇宝贝服务器使用非法模组
author: Im_buchun
txt_content:
链接：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=826453&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D3%26searchoption%5B23%5D%5Bvalue%5D%5B36%5D%3D36%26searchoption%5B23%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D1%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dselect
该服务器使用世代模组，在版规里应该是不允许的，希望版主能给一下评判
